Game_Structure

Class GUI_body

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_Structure.GUI_body

  • public class GUI_body
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI_body Class is implemented as a View class (Project is trying to approach to Model-view-controller design pattern) This class implemented to display content to the user and relays user command/action to the Controller. It initialize the frame and add panel to the frame which result in a complete Frame with the MenuItem that have trigger action
    Author:
    Edward Wong - University of Canterbury SENG_201 15/05/2020
